Pre-Game Insights: Denver looks to keep its four-game win streak alive when the Nuggets take on Dallas.
Denver went 57-25 overall and 33-19 in Western Conference play last season.
The Nuggets averaged 15.5 points off of turnovers, 13.7 second-chance points and 29.4 bench points last season.
Dallas went 50-32 overall and 31-21 in Western Conference action during the 2023-24 season.
The Mavericks averaged 6.9 steals, 5.0 blocks and 12.1 turnovers per game last season.
Others: Nuggets injuries: Vlatko Cancar: day to day (ankle), Aaron Gordon: out (calf), DaRon Holmes II: out for season (achilles).
Mavericks injuries: Dante Exum: out (wrist), Dereck Lively II: out (shoulder), P.J. Washington Jr.: out (knee), Maxi Kleber: out (hamstring).
